abstract: The $2.6 billion purchase will give UnitedHealth, the nation's largest health insurance company, its first managed care presence in Nevada.
snippet: The $2.6 billion purchase will give UnitedHealth, the nation's largest health insurance company, its first managed care presence in Nevada.
lead_paragraph: The UnitedHealth Group, the largest health insurance company in the nation, said yesterday that it had agreed to buy Sierra Health Services for $2.6 billion, adding customers in the Southwest and West.

headline.main: UnitedHealth Buys Sierra, Adding Western Customers
headline.print_headline: UnitedHealth Buys Sierra, Adding Western Customers
